channel.title: How do i change npc text?
channel.description: i change it in the file... save it compile it but i get a error in the npc file thiny .. when i try to run it , it says their a error in npc.file and can t run server... some tihng like that.. it use to work but doesnt now?

item.title: How do i change npc text?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Gamma Project Gamma
item.description:
@Project_Gamma wrote:

Open NPCHandler.java
Scroll down till you see somthing like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1201) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE?"; } }
Change The text of the npc is saying

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change npc text?

item.title: How do i change npc text?
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

If it says 1 error or more, then you obviously did something wrong. Just go to your client.java and do ctrl+f then type in what you want to change example, click here to get a fire cape! type that in the ctrl+f box and then it should take you to it then just delete what it says and type in what you want to say and save compile and run. But if their’s a error wron’t work gotta fix error first

Read full topic
